data.name: The Lost
data.detailed_description:
You are stranded, lost on an island. After surviving an aerial bombing on board the ISS liberty you make it on the lifeboats but quickly get knocked out and are stranded on an island. Survive, craft, defeat bosses, and more. Join or host a multiplayer server with your friends and try to survive together. With plenty of new features unseen in any other survival game you will have to explore what this game can offer.

More info coming soon.
data.about_the_game:
You are stranded, lost on an island. After surviving an aerial bombing on board the ISS liberty you make it on the lifeboats but quickly get knocked out and are stranded on an island. With plenty of new features unseen in any other survival game you will have to explore what this game can offer.

More info coming soon.
data.short_description: You survive a bombing from enemy planes, you are knocked out and on an island with no contact to the outside world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800GT
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
